column1: # Name: Women who believe a husband is justified in beating his wife when she argues with him (%)
# Definition: Survey question; Percent of women ages 15-49 who believe a husband/partner is justified in hitting or beating his wife/partner when she argues with him.
# Source: Compiled by World Bank from DHS Household Surveys
# Data from the No Ceilings project: http://noceilings.org
# For more about the data, please visit http://noceilings.org/data
